arts.ttl: Bournemouth and West Ham in discussions over signing Marseille player
arts.sum: The French media are slowly getting into the swing of things in the January transfer window, and that means multiple Ligue 1 players being linked with moves to multiple Premier League sides. Friday has been a busy day for that, and it’s now the turn of Bournemouth and West Ham United. arts.ttl: “He’s the perfect player” – Roberto De Zerbi explains why he loves Everton loanee Neal Maupay so much
arts.sum: While the rest of the world continues to simply dislike Neal Maupay, it seems the Everton loanee has earned himself one admirer: Marseille boss Roberto De Zerbi. RMC Sport cover comments from the Italian boss today in which he labels Maupay as “the perfect player” as the striker continues to do well on loan under The post “He’s the perfect player” – Roberto De Zerbi explains why he loves Everton loanee Neal Maupay so much appeared first on Sport Witness.

arts.ttl: Marseille gives its account of goalkeeper Lopez's failed loan move to Lens from Girona
arts.sum: Marseille gave its account Friday over goalkeeper Pau Lopez’s failed loan move to French rival Lens from Spanish club Girona. Marseille said it contacted the Spanish club again on Tuesday evening and received assurances that the required documentation — regarding the early termination agreement of Lopez’s Girona loan — would be sent to Marseille later that night or by Wednesday morning.
